ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to ensure no negative values are entered in numeric type fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( TotalAmount__c < 0 , QtdCommissioned__c < 0 , MaximumAllowedTime__c < 0, TotalWithdrawalLimitinUS__c < 0, TotalWithdrawalLimitinR__c < 0, TotalCardLimitinUS__c < 0, TotalCardLimitinR__c < 0, AmountCost__c < 0)
